ModInfo:
a02279c4-c947-44d9-84d6-4200486261d8 Carlucci Ace Music Manager Beta Media Carlucci, Ace 3.01 Beta Release: An All in One Music Manager. Future update with bombing mission track for Guard Scorpion Boss in the works. +++
Upcoming Updates: CAMS and CAMS-R are now being merged in one. The Carlucci Ace Music Manager or CAMM for short. 3.01 Adding Single Track Bonus Content for ALL Battles
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________--> 2/16/2022 Updates from Former CAMS-R: 3.583 New Artists Additions: Smooth Groove, The Reunion - FF7 PSX OST, Slayer Santiago, Feɴɪx Aʀk Aɴɢeʟes, Qhimm Mix, DisposedHeroVGM, Ivan H_ Juan Medrano (ocremix), Rifti Beats, Cashglom, ctrlaltQQ, FamilyJulez7x w/Those Who Fight Further Mix.
3.582 Added Single Tracks Bonus Contacnt: G. Scorpion 3.581 Corrected Mislables in 3 metal tracks. 3.580 Renamed all tracks with [artist name_location] 3.574 Updated Shuffle order; New .toml scripter run 3.573 Boss Battle Edits: Updated Looping and Increased/normalized track volume to -1.0 db. 3.572 Added Complete Artist List.ods inside cams-r root folder. 3.571 Description Update. 3.570 Updated Mod with Animated Logo. 3.560 Victory Music Edits: Updated Looping and Increased/normalized track volume to -1.0 db. 3.550 New artwork for Selection UI. 3.540 Changed OST Style Genre to Arranged Genre. 3.530 Battle Music Edits: Updated Looping and Increased/normalized track volume to -1.0 db. 3.520 Fixed: Issue #002 Vincent Bravo and Girlz Melon don't preview in victory fanfare. 3.520 Removed: Issue #003 Mattias Haggstrom Gerdt preview of thoses who fight further the button changes but no preview audio.
This mod is in Beta while being tested.
You can eventually find the Black version of this mod on my private catalog > iros://Url/http$chris.7thheaven.rocks/carlucci/CarlucciAceCatalogBlack.xml 2022-03-31
CAMM.gif
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________-->
List 0 Artist Collection ===++++Artist's Menu++++=== Our Artist's
List 0 Artist List Artist's This Is A Drop Down List With All The Artist's.
List 0 New Artist List New Artist's This Is A Drop Down List With All Our New Artist's. ++++New Artists April 2022++++-->
List 0 Main Album ================== Choose A Full Album and/or A Backup Album To Fill In Any Missing Tracks.
List 0 Album ===++++Album Selection++++=== Choose A Full Album and/or A Backup Album To Fill In Any Missing Tracks.
List 0 Main Album Main Album Main Source Album of Music
List 0 Secondary Album Secondary Album Secondary Album Source To Fill In Any Missing Tracks from Main Album.
List 0 Main Album ==================
List 0 Tracks ===++++Track Selection++++=== Allows User To Select Individual Tracks For A Custom Experience.
List 0 Secondary Album ==================
List 0 BattlesPlusEnemiesHeader ===Battle n' Enemies=== Battles and Enemies - Expand arrows on the left for track selection options.
List 0 weapon_Attack of the Weapon Attack of the Weapon "Attack of the Weapon " (ウェポン襲来, Wepon Shūrai?) - Plays during Weapon appearances.
List 0 lb1_Birth of a God Birth of a God "Birth of a God " (神の誕生, Kami no Tanjō?) - Plays during the battle with Bizarro∙Sephiroth.
List 0 fan2_Fanfare Fanfare "Fanfare " (ファンファーレ, Fanfāre?) - Plays after winning a battle.
List 0 chu2_Jenova Jenova "J-E-N-O-V-A " (J-E-N-O-V-A, [missing rōmaji]?) - Plays during battles against Jenova∙BIRTH, Jenova∙DEATH and Helletic Hojo, and during the descent to Jenova∙SYNTHESIS.
List 0 pj_Jenova Complete Jenova Complete "Jenova Complete " (完全なるジェノヴァ, Kanzen naru Jenova?) - Plays during the battle with Jenova∙SYNTHESIS.
List 0 chu_Those Who Fight Further Those Who Fight Further "Fight On! " (更に闘う者達, Sara ni Tatakau Monotachi?, lit. Those Who Fight Further ") - Plays during boss battles.
List 0 bat_Those Who Fight Those Who Fight "Let the Battles Begin! " (闘う者達, Tatakau Monotachi?, lit. Those Who Fight) -Plays during all normal battles.
List 0 lb2_One-Winged Angel One-Winged Angel "One-Winged Angel " (片翼の天使, Katayoku no Tenshi?) - Plays during the battle with Safer∙Sephiroth.
List 0 sinra_Shinra Company Shinra Company "Shinra, Inc " (神羅カンパニー, Shinra Kanpanī?, lit. Shinra Company) - Plays during cutscenes involving Shinra Electric Power Company.
List 0 cephiros_Those Chosen by the Planet Those Chosen by the Planet "Those Chosen by the Planet " (星に選ばれし者, Hoshi ni Erabareshi Mono?) - Sephiroth's theme, it plays during the dragon battle at the start of the flashback to the Nibelheim Incident, at the Shinra Mansion in Nibelheim, and during the final fight with Sephiroth.
List 0 cintro_Those Chosen by the Planet Those Chosen by the Planet "Those Chosen by the Planet " (星に選ばれし者, Hoshi ni Erabareshi Mono?) - Bell and heartbeat loop only.
List 0 nointro_Those Chosen by the Planet 2 Those Chosen by the Planet "Those Chosen by the Planet " (星に選ばれし者, Hoshi ni Erabareshi Mono?) - Version without intro and increased tempo.
List 0 rhythm_Turk's Theme Turk's Theme "Turks' Theme " (タークスのテーマ, Tākusu no Tēma?) - Plays in any room or cutscene the Turks appear in.
List 0 CharacterHeader ===Characters=== Characters - Expand arrows on the left for track selection options.
List 0 earis_Aerith's Theme Aerith's Theme "Aerith's Theme " (エアリスのテーマ, Earisu no Tēma?) - Plays during scenes with Aeris and Sephiroth in the Forgotten City and during the subsequent battle with Jenova∙LIFE.
List 0 Barret_Barret's Theme Barrets Theme "Barret's Theme " (バレットのテーマ, Baretto no Tēma?) - Plays as the background to Sector 7 and the 7th Heaven after Cloud agrees to attack the Sector 5 Reactor.
List 0 ketc_Cait Sith's Theme Cait Sith's Theme "Cait Sith's Theme " (ケット・シーのテーマ, Ketto Shī no Tēma?) - Plays when the player first meets Cait Sith in the Gold Saucer and during prominent scenes featuring him.
List 0 sid2_Cid's Theme Cid's Theme "Cid's Theme " (シドのテーマ, Shido no Tēma?) - Plays when meeting Cid and during prominent scenes featuring him.
List 0 yufi_Descendant of Shinobi Descendant of Shinobi "Descendant of Shinobi " (忍びの末裔, Shinobi no Matsuei?) - Plays upon meeting Yuffie and during prominent scenes with her.
List 0 red_Red XIIIs Theme Red XIIIs Theme "Red XIII's Theme " (レッドXIIIのテーマ, Reddo XIII no Tēma?) - Plays when Red XIII introduces himself to the party.
List 0 seto_The Great Warrior The Great Warrior "The Great Warrior " (偉大なる戦士, Idai naru Senshi?) - Plays during scenes in Cosmo Canyon when Red XIII discovers the truth about his father.
List 0 vincent_The Nightmare Begins The Nightmare Begins "The Nightmare Begins " (悪夢の始まり, Akumu no Hajimari?) - Plays in basement of Shinra Mansion, when meeting Vincent, and during Lucrecia's flashback.
List 0 Tifa's Theme Tifa's Theme "Tifa's Theme " (ティファのテーマ, Tifa no Tēma?) -Plays during Tifa's flashbacks and in the 7th Heaven before the party leaves to attack the Sector 5 Reactor.
List 0 hen_Who... Am I Who... Am I "Who... Am I? " (俺は…誰だ, Ore wa... Dare da?) - Plays in Mideel after Cloud is found.
List 0 yume_Who... Are You Who... Are You "Who... Are You? " (お前は…誰だ, Omae wa... Dare da?) - Plays during cutscenes involving either Jenova or Sephiroth.
List 0 GameMomentsHeader ===Game Moments=== Game Moments - Expand arrows on the left for track selection options.
List 0 over2_Continue Continue "Continue " (つづきから, Tsuzuki Kara?) - Plays when the game is over.
List 0 ro_Countdown Countdown "Countdown " (秒読み開始, Byōyomi Kaishi?) - Plays during the rocket launch cutscene.
List 0 geki_Debut Debut "Debut " (初舞台, Hatsu Butai?) - Plays during the play at Gold Saucer.
List 0 roll_Staff Roll Staff Roll "Ending Credits " (スタッフロール, Sutaffu Rōru?, lit. Staff Roll) - Plays in the credits.
List 0 fan2_Fanfare Fanfare "Fanfare " (ファンファーレ, Fanfāre?) - Plays after winning a battle.
List 0 yago_Good Night, Until Tomorrow Good Night, Until Tomorrow "Good Night, Until Tomorrow " (お休み,また明日, Oyasumi, Mata Ashita?) - Plays during a rest at an inn.
List 0 sadsid_Launching a Dream into Space Launching a Dream into Space "Launching a Dream Into Space " (宇宙への夢, Uchū e no Yume?) - Plays when the party is launched into space.
List 0 cannonMako Cannon Mako Cannon Pending
List 0 guitar2_Other Side of the Mountain Other Side of the Mountain "Other Side of the Mountain " (山の向こうに, Yama no Mukō ni?) - Plays when Tifa realizes Cloud's deepest memory when both are submerged in the Lifestream.
List 0 parade_Rufus' Welcoming Ceremony Rufus' Welcoming Ceremony "Rufus's Welcoming Ceremony " (ルーファウス歓迎式典, Rūfausu Kangei Shikiten?) - Plays during Rufus's welcoming ceremony, the marching minigame and from there on after in Junon until Part II.
List 0 jyro_Steal the Tiny Bronco! Steal the Tiny Bronco! "Steal the Tiny Bronco! " (タイニーブロンコを奪え!, Tainī Buronko o Ubae!?) - Plays when the party steals the Tiny Bronco from Rocket Town.
List 0 yufi2_Stolen Materia Stolen Materia "Stolen Materia " (マテリアいただき, Materia Itadaki?) - Plays when Yuffie steals the party's Materia.
List 0 riku_The Destruction of Shinra The Destruction of Shinra part 1 "Mako Cannon - The Destruction of Shinra " (魔晄キャノン発射～神羅爆発, Makō Kyanon Hassha ~ Shinra Bakuhatsu?) - Plays during the FMV where the cannon destroys the shield of the North Crater.
List 0 si_The Destruction of Shinra The Destruction of Shinra part 2 "Mako Cannon - The Destruction of Shinra " (魔晄キャノン発射～神羅爆発, Makō Kyanon Hassha ~ Shinra Bakuhatsu?) - Plays during the FMV where the cannon destroys the shield of the North Crater.
List 0 pre_The Prelude The Prelude "The Prelude " (プレリュード, Pureryūdo?) - Plays during the introduction screen.
List 0 date_Words Drowned by Fireworks Words Drowned by Fireworks "Words Drowned By Fireworks " (花火に消された言葉, Hanabi ni Kesareta Kotoba?) - Plays on the Round House ride in Gold Saucer during the date scene.
List 0 lb2_One-Winged Angel One-Winged Angel "One-Winged Angel " (片翼の天使, Katayoku no Tenshi?) - Plays during the battle with Safer∙Sephiroth.
List 0 fanfare_Parade Fanfare Parade Fanfare Description only by SegaChief: Plays during send off minigame, when doing the special at the end of the sequence
List 0 sinra_Shinra Company Shinra Company "Shinra, Inc " (神羅カンパニー, Shinra Kanpanī?, lit. Shinra Company) - Plays during cutscenes involving Shinra Electric Power Company.
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________-->
List 0 MinigamesHeader ===Minigames=== Minigames - Expand arrows on the left for track selection options.
List 0 elec_Electric de Chocobo Electric de Chocobo "Electric de Chocobo " (エレキ・デ・チョコボ, Ereki de Chokobo?) - Plays during a battle encounter with a chocobo and during the snowboarding minigame.
List 0 fiddle_Fiddle de Chocobo Fiddle de Chocobo Plays during the chocobo racing, and in Mideel when near the White Chocobo.
List 0 condor_Fort Condor Fort Condor "Fort Condor " (鷺の砦, Sagi no Toride?) - Plays during fights at Fort Condor.
List 0 crwin_Jackpot! Jackpot! "Jackpot! " (大当たりぃ~, Ōatarī~?) -Plays if the player wins a chocobo race.
List 0 crlost_Tango of Tears Tango of Tears "Tango of Tears " (涙のタンゴ, Namida no Tango?) - Plays if the player loses a chocobo race.
List 0 chase_Crazy Motorcycle Crazy Motorcycle "The Chase " (クレイジーモーターサイクル, Kureijī Mōtāsaikuru?, lit. Crazy Motorcycle) - Plays during the motorcycle minigame.
List 0 mogu_The Highwind Takes Skies_2 The Highwind Takes Skies (Intro) "The Highwind Takes to the Skies " (空駆けるハイウィンド, Sora Kakeru Haiwindo?) - Plays after the player beats the Mog House game in Gold Saucer.
List 0 odds_Racing Chocobo's - Place Your Bets Racing Chocobo's - Place Your Bets "Win / Place / Show Chocobo! " (本命穴チョコボ, Honmei Ana Chokobo?, lit. Place Chocobo) - Plays in the Chocobo Square of the Gold Saucer.
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________-->
List 0 PlacesHeader ===Places=== Places - Expand arrows on the left for track selection options.
List 0 kurai_Heart of Anxiety Heart of Anxiety "Anxiety " (不安な心, Fuan na Kokoro?, lit. Anxious Heart) - Plays in several areas, such as the Train Graveyard and Nibelheim.
List 0 ob_Bombing Mission Bombing Mission "Bombing Mission " (オープニング~爆破ミッション, Bakuha Misshon?) - Plays after attack on the Sector 1 Reactor.
List 0 snow_Buried in Snow Buried in Snow "Buried in Snow " (雪に閉ざされて, Yuki ni Tozasarete?) - Plays in the Great Glacier.
List 0 canyon_Cosmo Canyon Cosmo Canyon "Cosmo Canyon " (星降る峡谷, Hoshi Furu Kyōkoku?, lit. Valley of the Falling Stars) - Plays in Cosmo Canyon.
List 0 costa_Costa del Sol Costa del Sol "Costa del Sol " (太陽の海岸, Taiyō no Kaigan?, lit. Sun Coast) - Plays in Costa del Sol.
List 0 tender_Dear to the Heart Dear to the Heart "Dear to the Heart " (想いを胸に, Omoi o Mune ni?) - Plays on multiple occasions, most notably when the party first leaves Midgar, as well as in some towns and during some cutscenes involving the entire party.
List 0 rukei_Desert Wasteland Desert Wasteland "Desert Wasteland " (砂の流刑地, Suna no Ryūkeichi?) - Plays in the Corel Prison.
List 0 corneo_Don of the Slums Don of the Slums "Don of the Slums " (スラムのドン, Suramu no Don?) - Plays in Don Corneo's Mansion.
List 0 bokujo_Farm Boy Farm Boy "Farm Boy " (牧場の少年, Bokujō no Shōnen?) - Plays in the Chocobo Farm.
List 0 earislo_Flowers Blooming in the Church Flowers Blooming in the Church "Flowers Blooming in the Church " (教会に咲く花, Kyōkai ni Saku Hana?) - is an arrangement of "Aerith's Theme " that plays as the background theme for the Sector 5 Church and Aeris's house in the Sector 5 slums, as well as in several in-game cutscenes involving Aeris.
List 0 jukai_Forested Temple Forested Temple "Forested Temple " (樹海の神殿, Jukai no Shinden?) - Plays in the Temple of the Ancients.
List 0 junon_From the Edge of Despair From the Edge of Despair "From the Edge of Despair " (絶望の淵から, Zetsubō no Fuchi kara?) - Plays in Mideel when Cloud is hurt, and in Rocket Town after Meteor has been summoned.
List 0 gold1_Gold Saucer Gold Saucer "Gold Saucer " (ゴールドソーサー, Gōrudo Sōsā?) - Plays in the Gold Saucer.
List 0 bee_Honeybee Inn Honeybee Inn "Honeybee Inn " (蜜蜂の館, Mitsubachi no Yakata?) - Plays in the Honey Bee Inn.
List 0 aseri2_Hurry Up! Hurry Up! "Hurry Up! " (もっと急げ!, Motto Isoge!?) - Plays during battles in the Battle Square, when Cid and the party try to stop the runaway train from hitting North Corel and on the World Map when Diamond Weapon appears.
List 0 aseri_Hurry Hurry "Hurry " (急げ!, Isoge!?) - Plays in a number of areas, including when escaping from Reno in the Church after Aerith introduces herself to Cloud. Also, during the revisit of Sector 7 and during the climb to the top of the Sector 7 Plate.
List 0 dun2_In Search of the Man in Black In Search of the Man in Black "In Search of the Main in Black " (黒マントの男を追え, Kuro Manto no Otoko o Oe?) - Plays in the Mythril Mine, Ancient Forest and the Sleeping Forest among other locations.
List 0 sinraslo_Infiltrating Shinra Infiltrating Shinra "Infiltrating Shinra " (神羅ビル潜入, Shinra Biru Sennyū?) - Plays in the Shinra Headquarters.
List 0 sido_It's Hard to Stand on Both Feet! It's Hard to Stand on Both Feet! "It's Hard to Stand on Both Feet! " (二本足で立つのも難しいものだな, Nihon Ashi de Tatsu no mo Muzukashii Mono da na?) - Plays on the ship from Junon to Costa del Sol.
List 0 ld_Judgment Day Judgment Day "Judgment Day " (最期の日, Saigo no Hi?) - Plays in the Northern Cave.
List 0 boo_Lifestream Lifestream "Lifestream " (生命の流れ, Seimei no Nagare?, lit. Stream of Life) - Plays during scenes at Cosmo Canyon Observatory when Bugenhagen explains about the Planet and the Lifestream.
List 0 iseki_Listen to the Cries of the Planet Listen to the Cries of the Planet "Listen to the Cries of the Planet " (星の声が聞こえる, Hoshi no Koe ga Kikoeru?) - Plays in the Forgotten City.
List 0 ayasi_Lurking in the Darkness Lurking in the Darkness "Lurking In the Darkness " (闇に潜む, Yami ni Hisomu?) - Plays at the plate interior and several underground areas.
List 0 makoroMako Reactor Mako Reactor "Mako Reactor " (魔晄炉, Makō Ro?) - Plays inside each of the Mako Reactors.
List 0 sadbarMark of a Traitor Mark of a Traitor "Mark of a Traitor " (裏切り者の烙印, Uragirimono no Rakuin?) - Plays in North Corel.
List 0 corelMining Town Mining Town "Mining Town " (炭坑の街, Tankō no Machi?) - Plays during Barret's flashbacks at Corel.
List 0 mati_On Our Way On Our Way "On Our Way " (旅の途中で, Tabi no Tochū De?) - Plays in various towns such as Kalm and Junon.
List 0 tm_On That Day Five Years Ago On That Day Five Years Ago "On That Day, Five Years Ago... " (5年前のあの日, Gonen Mae no ano Hi?) - Plays on multiple occasions, most notably during the Nibelheim Incident flashbacks and Cloud and Tifa's night under the Highwind before entering the Northern Cave.
List 0 siera_Open Your Heart Open Your Heart "Open Your Heart " (心開けば, Kokoro Akeba?) - Plays during non-battle scenes in Fort Condor, and in the Materia Caves.
List 0 mura1_Provincial Town Provincial Town "Provincial Town " (偏狭の村, Henkyō no Mura?) - Plays in Bone Village and Mideel.
List 0 mekyu_Reunion Reunion "Reunion " (リユニオン, Riyunion?) - Plays when Shinra finds the Promised Land.
List 0 gun_Shinra's Full-Scale Assault Shinra's Full-Scale Assault "Shinra's Full-Scale Assault " (神羅軍総攻撃, Shinra-gun Sōkōgeki?) - Plays during the FMV with Barret shows Tifa the Meteor, when Cloud is going through various obstacles when trying to reach the upper plate to get to Shinra headquarters, and in Junon after acquiring the Highwind.
List 0 rocket_The Oppressed The Oppressed "The Oppressed " (虐げられた民衆, Shiitagerareta Minshū?) - Plays in Wall Market and Rocket Town.
List 0 horror_Trail of Blood Trail of Blood "Trail of Blood " (血の跡, Chi no Ato?) - Plays in the Shinra Headquarters after the party escapes from the cells and in the Cave of the Gi under Cosmo Canyon.
List 0 dokubo_Under the Rotting Pizza Under the Rotting Pizza "Under the Rotting Pizza " (腐ったピザの下で, Kusatta Piza no Shita de?) - Plays in Sector 5 and Sector 6 Slums.
List 0 walz_Waltz de Chocobo Waltz de Chocobo "Waltz de Chocobo " (ワルツ・デ・チョコボ, Warutsu de Chokobo?) - Plays when the chocobos dance at the Chocobo Farm.
List 0 utai_Wutai Wutai "Wutai " (ウータイ, Ūtai?) - Plays in Wutai.
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________-->
List 0 WorldMapHeader ===World Map=== World Map - Expand arrows on the left for track selection options.
List 0 kita_The North Cave The North Cave "The North Cave " (北の大空洞, Kita no Daikūdō?) - Plays in crater at top of world and is the second and final theme when walking on the world map.
List 0 cinco_Cinco de Chocobo Cinco de Chocobo "Cinco de Chocobo " (シンコ・デ・チョコボ, Shinko de Chokobo?) - Plays while riding a chocobo on the World Map.
List 0 hiku_The Highwind Takes to the Skies The Highwind Takes Skies "The Highwind Takes to the Skies " (空駆けるハイウィンド, Sora Kakeru Haiwindo?) - Plays during flights with the Highwind.
List 0 sea_Secret of the Deep Sea Secret of the Deep Sea "Secret of the Deep Sea " (深海に眠る秘密, Shinkai ni Nemuru Himitsu?) - Plays on the submarine.
List 0 taMain Theme of Final Fantasy VII 1 Main Theme "Main Theme of FINAL FANTASY VII " (F.F.VIIメインテーマ, F.F. VII Mein Tēma?) - First theme on the world map.
-->
-->
List 0 tbMain Theme of Final Fantasy VII 2 2 Main Theme "Main Theme of FINAL FANTASY VII " (F.F.VIIメインテーマ, F.F. VII Mein Tēma?) - Description only by Sega Chief: "During the Mideel sequence where Tifa helps Cloud figure out what actually happened in Nibelheim, the 2nd version of the main theme is used when Cloud takes his helmet off. This starts at a different point and is supposed to line up with the conclusion of the scene.
